plot outline: Vijay, a windmill Engineer goes to Australia for work from India. He falls in love with Emily who he later finds is being searched by local police as a missing person. Vijay also becomes a suspect in a murder case. The movie ends with several twists and turns.
title: Maha Maha
akas: Saaya Ek Pyar Ka (India, Hindi title)
plot: Vijay, a windmill Engineer goes to Australia for work from India. He falls in love with Emily who he later finds is being searched by local police as a missing person. Vijay also becomes a suspect in a murder case. The movie ends with several twists and turns.

The story is about a windmill engineer from India who goes to work in a little town in Australia. He falls in love with an Australian girl, who he later finds is being pursued by the local police. He himself becomes a suspect in a murder case. A lot of twists and turns lead to a suspenseful ending.
